Doc: A type describing the dividend payout ratio associated with an equity underlyer. In certain cases the actual ratio is not known on trade inception, and only general conditions are then specified.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type describing the dividend payout ratio associated with an equity underlyer. In certain cases the actual ratio is not known on trade inception, and only general conditions are then specified.
 #/
record FpML5.legal.DividendPayout {
  # Specifies the total actual dividend payout ratio associated with the equity underlyer.
  dividendPayoutRatio : decimal

  # Specifies the cash actual dividend payout ratio associated with the equity underlyer.
  dividendPayoutRatioCash : decimal?

  # Specifies the non cash actual dividend payout ratio associated with the equity underlyer.
  dividendPayoutRatioNonCash : decimal?

  # Specifies the dividend payout conditions that will be applied in the case where the actual ratio is not known, typically because of regulatory or legal uncertainties.
  dividendPayoutConditions : string

  # The next upcoming dividend payment or payments.
  dividendPayment : FpML5.legal.PendingPayment?

}

dividendPayoutRatio.Doc: Specifies the total actual dividend payout ratio associated with the equity underlyer.
dividendPayoutRatio.Name: dividendPayoutRatio

dividendPayoutRatioCash.Doc: Specifies the cash actual dividend payout ratio associated with the equity underlyer.
dividendPayoutRatioCash.Name: dividendPayoutRatioCash

dividendPayoutRatioNonCash.Doc: Specifies the non cash actual dividend payout ratio associated with the equity underlyer.
dividendPayoutRatioNonCash.Name: dividendPayoutRatioNonCash

dividendPayoutConditions.Doc: Specifies the dividend payout conditions that will be applied in the case where the actual ratio is not known, typically because of regulatory or legal uncertainties.
dividendPayoutConditions.Name: dividendPayoutConditions

dividendPayment.Doc: The next upcoming dividend payment or payments.
dividendPayment.Name: dividendPayment
